channel.title: "Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit."
channel.description: When I jarred and signed my client. I then tried to run it and see if it was okay to make a webclient. Then that came up, I don't know if it makes any difference but I have a Class and a Java folder. So there is just the runs and compilers in the main part of the folder. If you have any idea how to fix this, please help.

item.title: "Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit."

item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Did you add your main class as “client” or “egui” or whatever class your client uses to startup?
